mapper.select: select t.teacher_id, teacher.name as teacher_name, t.lesson_count from (select teacher_id, sum(count) as lesson_count from t_course_fee where date between #{start} and #{end} and del_flag = 0 group by teacher_id) t left join t_teacher teacher on teacher.id = t.teacher_id and teacher.del_flag = 0 order by teacher.create_time desc
